channel.title: Mark Foley
channel.description:
For those who know who he is...
what do you guys think should be done to him? Honestly i think he needs to go to jail just like everyone else not just hide behind the fact he is a drunk is "gay" and got molested by a priest when he was a kid..
Just because you get molested when you were a kid doesn't give you the right to try and do it to someone else then hide behind it =\

item.title: Mark Foley
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]They would cut a small whole a few inches underneath your belly-button, pull out a peice of your intestine, tie it to a tree, then force you to walk around the tree, slowly pulling out all 28 feet of intestine inch by inch, until you die. Big Grin

Yeah, well, the Vikings came to America, and promptly left. Which shows you how wise they truly were.[/quote]

True, because American Indians kick ass!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Mark Foley
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Well, chances are your ancestors were vikings as well. And, at some point, Genghis Khan most likely fathered one of your ancestors, as did Charlemagne. It’s just one of those things, the gene pool isn’t that diverse.

Read full topic

They would cut a small whole a few inches underneath your belly-button, pull out a peice of your intestine, tie it to a tree, then force you to walk around the tree, slowly pulling out all 28 feet of intestine inch by inch, until you die.

and his lawyer is trying to make money… you dont have to believe in the guy that your protecting as long as he pays out.

item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT

Paul yes i think that the poeple that knew should get into trouble also but not him get away with it.

Shit, I think those who encourage and allow pedophiles to continue on their paths are worse than the pedophiles.

and his lawyer is trying to make money.. you dont have to believe in the guy that your protecting as long as he pays out.

That’s true, but I belive Foley, do you?

Where did I get those things? The american indians used to kill people that way <3 Smiley

My ancestors were the illest. Vikings would bury people under the sand up to their necks and wait untill the tide came in. But, they usually just got bored, dug them out, and used a battle axe to open their spine. They would pull out the lungs slowly while the vicitim still lived, and watch as they flapped, like butterflies.

item.title: Mark Foley
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Thats true but you cant blame other people... thats like me saying mom im going to kill pault next week and then do it blame her for knowing...

In this case, where hundreds of people sat on this information for years in some cases, and allowed the situation to continue, there’s no point punishing Mark Foley unless you punish those who made his power trip possible.

I disagree with your analogy. It’s actually more like if you were bullying a kid at school, and your mom knew, and she just let you bully the kid day, after day, after day. Then the principle found out, and he let you bully the kid. Then the local newspaper found out, and they waited untill right before you were running for class president, and then wrote an article about what a terrible kid you were.

But its just weak that he is hiding behind being molested.

Well, his lawyer made the statement, and it’s possible that he was not alone in choosing to reveal this information at this time. I’m not questioning that he was in fact molested as a child, but was it solely his choice to reveal the information now, or is part of his lawyers defence?

Edit: The worst conversations Foley had were with somebody over the age of 18:
http://drudgereport.com/flashmfa.htm

Read full topic

item.title: Mark Foley
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Paul what does the media have to do with anything?

The media reported that he had been molested as a child and was a self-proclaimed alcoholic seeking rehabiliation. These two things have nothing to do with the scandal at hand, and they shouldn’t even be viewed as Foley making excuses, they are simply irrelevant reports by the media on something that is none of our business, and should be ignored.

politicians that do sick things like that…

All politicians are sick. Too many people have protected and helped Foley. Too many newsmen have sat on the reports. Even the FBI did nothing when it was reported to them, months ago.

Foley doesn’t deserve to be punished, when those who are truly at fault are those who allowed this to happen over and over, and those who did nothing when they heard about it.[/quote]

Thats true but you cant blame other people… thats like me saying mom im going to kill pault next week and then do it blame her for knowing…

But its just weak that he is hiding behind being molested.

Read full topic

They should take him out in the woods, find a red ant mound, put a stake in it, tie him up on the stake, pour honey all over his body, and stir up the ants with a knife or somthing. Then leave him there for the ants to slowly and painfully eat over the next few days until he dies.

Sounds kinda kinky…
